General.Name: International Conveyors Limited
General.Description: International Conveyors Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacturing and marketing of PVC conveyor belting products in India. It operates through Conveyor Belting, Wind Energy, and Trading Goods segments. The company offers fire-resistance and anti-static conveyor belting for conveying coal, potash, phosphate, fertilizer, clay, gypsum, and salt, as well as for use in timber industry. It also trades in ply and steel cord conveyor belting products, and fittings and accessories. In addition, the company generates, supplies, and sells wind power through its five windmills with a total installed capacity of 4.65 MW located in Karnataka, Maharashtra, Gujarat, and Andhra Pradesh. International Conveyors Limited also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is based in Kolkata, India.
